articles.description: New Delhi, Sep 17 (PTI) Home-grown FMCG major Dabur is scaling up its digestive brand Hajmola and mosquito repellent brand Odomos, amplifying their reach to include them on the list of its power brands, CEO Mohit Malhotra said.
articles.content: Dabur has expanded Real brand from juices and nectars category to a diverse range of products, including fruit drinks, a PET portfolio, aloe vera-based drinks, plant-based drinks like Soya and Almond… [+142 chars]

articles.author: Nikita Prasad
articles.title: Dividend Stocks: SAIL, Mastek, RVNL, Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders, others to trade ex-dividend this week; check full list | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The ex-dividend date is the day on which the equity share price adjusts to reflect the next dividend payout. It is the day the stock becomes ex-dividend, which means it does not carry the value of its next dividend payment from that day forward.
articles.content: Dividend Stocks: Shares of several companies including Steel Authority of India (SAIL), Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders, Rail Vikas Nigam Limited (RVNL), Mastek Ltd, among several others will trade ex-divi… [+8734 chars]

articles.author: Janaki Krishnan
articles.title: Gautam Adani bolsters control: Raises stakes in key companies with $2.6 billion spent - BusinessLine
articles.description: Gautam Adani has been raising stakes in his key companies over the last month, spending $2.6B. He sold small stakes to US investment firm GQG Partners to instil confidence among investors, and raised over $5B through strategic sales. Recently, he has been buy…
articles.content: Billionaire Gautam Adani is firming up his grip on his empire and has been raising stakes in some of his key companies over the last month or so. About $2.6 billion would have been spent so far on th… [+2715 chars]
